nodes.text: Beckett's gang, also known as Tobias Beckett's crew, was a gang led by the criminal Tobias Beckett some time during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Composed of specialized scoundrels, Beckett assembled the team to carry out profitable but risky heists. The smuggler Han Solo was offered a place in the crew.

Tobias Beckett's crew was first revealed in the very first look at the upcoming Star Wars Anthology Series film Solo: A Star Wars Story, the "Big Game" TV spot released during Super Bowl LII on February 4, 2018.
Early story outlines for Solo included an additional member of the gang, a "squid-monkey" named Zapf, who was eventually amalgamated into Rio Durant's character.
